thread.title: 'Fan' actress Waluscha De Sousa is all set to reveal the secret behind her toned body!
thread.title_full: 'Fan' actress Waluscha De Sousa is all set to reveal the secret behind her toned body! - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: 'Fan' actress Waluscha De Sousa is all set to reveal the secret behind her toned body!
text:
Waluscha De Sousa 
Fan (2016) actress Waluscha De Sousa who danced in the music video for Trippy, from Himesh Reshammiya's album, Aap Se Mausiiquii, is busy gathering compliments for her toned body. She worked out like crazy before the shoot. Waluscha is often asked about her fitness regime, so she's planning to share her secrets in a soon-to-be launched show on a digital platform.
